revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Geniatech |model=Enjoy TV |revision=Box (ATV2000) |fcc_date=05/17/2011 |is_manuf=No |availability= |type=media player |fcc_id=ZJUATV1000ATV2000 |pwr_v=5.3 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Amlogic |cpu1_model=AML8726 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SD Card |expansion_usb_num=5 |serial= |jtag= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188CUS |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=HDMI out, |tp_firmware=Android |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Geniatech Enjoy TV Box}} :[http://www.geniatech.com/pa/atv2000.asp Product page]
Per the FCC data, this FCC ID also covers the (white) ATV1000. {{See also|Geniatech Enjoy TV Stick (ATV100)|SRCT N03}} Sources would seem to indicate this device has 802.11 wireless capability. :The device may be 802.11b/g/n capable.
===Specifications=== *CPU: ARM Cortex A9 @800MHz, 3D engine *Flash: 512MB (up to 8GB) *RAM: 512MB (DDR2) *USB 2.0: 3x external, 2x internal
===Links=== *[http://www.focalgadgets.com/geniatech-enjoy-tv-plus-atv2000-1080p-media-player-android-2-2-smart-tv-box-dvb-t-atsc-isdb-t-tuner.html On '''FocalGadgets'''] *[http://androidforums.com/google-tv/408166-geniatech-enjoy-tv.html Information and specs on '''Android''' forums] :The device, per the bootloader log, uses an ''[[Amlogic]]'' chip.
